account.title: Account

additional_sensors.description:
Protocol: **{protocol_name}**
Device name: **{device_name}**

Choose what sensors should be shown with the device.
Confirm current settings for default mode of operation.

Selected protocol: **{protocol_name}**
Device name: **{device_name}**

Choose what switches should be shown with the device.
Confirm current settings for default mode of operation.
additional_switches.title: Switches

user.description: There are two ways to connect to Hekr platform: cloud and local. To connect using cloud service choose `account` option. To connect via local network choose `device` option.
user.title: Hekr Setup
